summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of North Seventieth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Fremont Avenue; of North Seventy-first Street, from Dayton Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and of Dayton Avenue, from North Seventieth Street to North Seventy-second Street; all in The City of Seattle; providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades of North Seventieth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Fremont Avenue; North Seventy-first Street, from Dayton Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and of Dayton Avenue, from North Seventieth Street to North Seventy-second Street; all in The City of Seattle; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of the above described streets and avenue, and for the changing and establishing of the grades and the grading and regrading of the above described streets and avenues to approaches thereto in conformity with the grades established herein; for the necessary slopes, for the cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said streets and avenues and approaches thereto, and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
